text: Hec convare dar rui zamin nest va hec parrandae ʙo ʙolhoi xud dar havo nameparad, magar on ki cun monandi sumo toifae hastand, ki xalqijatason misli sumost. Mo dar in kitoʙ (ja'ne dar "Lahvu-l- mahfuz") hec cizero tark nakardaem. Va sipas hamaro tamomi mardumonro dar nazdi Parvardigorason gird meovarand, ʙaroi hisoʙu kitoʙ
